articles.author: Tanmay Kadam
articles.title: ‘Apocalyptic Conflict’: Attack On Russian Aircraft In Neutral Airspace Will Be Seen As Declaration Of War — Top Diplomat - EurAsian Times
articles.description: Ukraine became the world’s third largest arms importer after Qatar and India in 2022, thanks to Russia’s full-scale invasion of the country last year, according to a recent report by the Stockholm International Peace Research Institute (SIPRI).
articles.content:
A deliberate attack on a Russian aircraft in neutral airspace would be an open declaration of war against a nuclear power. This was announced by Russian Ambassador to Washington Anatoly Antonov.

articles.title: Southeast Asia VC firms could see a larger impact from SVB fallout than startups - CNBC
articles.description: Some VC firms could face challenges in finding another bank that offers the same product offering as Silicon Valley Bank.
